name: Repo OS Spec
purpose: Defines repo operating system: structure, invariants, naming, workflows.

name: Definition of Done (Quality Bar)
purpose: Uniform completion criteria across prompts, code, tests, docs, security.

name: Repo OS Module
purpose: Hierarchical module implementing repo operating system; exposes its own control plane.

name: Design Framework Module
purpose: Provides Spec Pack + Gates templates and an apply script to anchor agent builds.

name: Repo OS Bootstrap Meta-Prompt
purpose: One-shot prompt to scaffold repo OS into an empty repo.

name: Framework Install Meta-Prompt
purpose: Prompt that installs selected frameworks from registry plan.

name: Framework Verify Meta-Prompt
purpose: Prompt that verifies selected frameworks and updates status/evidence.
